product_description: Keep your room free from excess humidity without affecting the room temperature with the Lloyd Window Air Conditioner. When the power is restored after a power cut, this air conditioner automatically restarts on the previous setting for added convenience. Furthermore, when there is a malfunction, this air conditioner’s self-diagnosis function enables the smart chips to recognise the issue and display it on the LED screen. And, the robust condenser is well-protected from rust, owing to its hydrophilic aluminium fins.

product_description: Keep yourself cool and comfortable during sweltering summer days with the Lloyd Split Inverter Air Conditioner. product_description: You can enjoy an enhanced cooling experience with the help of the Lloyd 0.8 ton Split Inverter Air Conditioner. With its PM 2.5 filter, this air conditioner can effectively remove even small pollutants from the air to provide purified indoor air. Thanks to its wide operating range from -10°C to 52°C, this air conditioner enables you to conveniently regulate the temperature as per the weather conditions. Moreover, courtesy of its stabiliser-free operation, this air conditioner is safeguarded against voltage fluctuations to ensure effortless usage, relaxation, energy savings, and safety.

It features an Automatic 4D-swing function which provides an omnidirectional airflow and helps cool your room evenly. Additionally, this AC’s Turbo Cool mode enables it to cool your room in a short period of time so that you can enjoy its comforting breeze without having to wait for a long time.

product_description: Keep your space filled with cool air and enjoy better air quality with the Lloyd Window Air Conditioner. With the help of a self-diagnosis function, the chips in this air conditioner detect issues that can hinder its performance and indicate it on the LED screen. These chips also start the protect function for safety. And, when electricity resumes after an outage, the auto-restart feature starts this AC’s operations according to the previously used setting. Moreover, the advanced air filter in this air conditioner ensures that the air you breathe is of good quality.

This way, you can self-diagnose the problem and contact Daikin's authorised service centre for an immediate solution.

product_description:
Power Chill Operation: During extreme heat conditions when rooms require quick cooling, power chill ensures room temperature drops rapidly for immediate comfort.
Good Sleep Off Timer: You can prevent excessive cooling of the room during sleep by setting a temperature shift value. The air conditioner automatically stops after the preset time has elapsed, thereby conserving electricity.
R32-Befriending the environment: R32 (Green Refrigerant) has zero Ozone Depletion Potential (ODP) and Modified Global Warming Potential (GWP) of 472, compared to R410As Modified GWP of 2,027. Also R32 is a single component refrigerant, which makes it easy to recycle. It is because of these reasons that R32 offers the lowest total emissions and best overall life cycle climate performance.

product_description: Energy-efficient and high-performance, the Daikin 1.5 Ton Split Inverter Air Conditioner is an ideal cooling solution for summers. It provides excellent performance with low power usage, keeping your utility bills in check. And, this air conditioner works with a wide range of compressor frequencies, thanks to Daikin's inverter technology. Furthermore, its triple display feature allows you to keep track of inverter technology's energy efficiency by displaying it in real-time as a predicted energy usage percentage. On this display, you can also see the set/room temperature and the error code.

It uses Inverter Compressor technology to provide quick cooling and energy-efficient performance during summers. Additionally, this air conditioner eliminates the need for a separate stabiliser by operating over a wide voltage range between 140 V and 280 V. Furthermore, this air conditioner is equipped with Turbo Cool Mode, providing high cooling performance in a matter of minutes, even during the extreme summer months.

product_description: You can stay cool and relaxed even during summers with the Daikin 1.5 Ton Split Inverter Air Conditioner. With its Streamer Discharge technology, this air conditioner offers clean air inside your room. Integrated with one-button Dew Clean technology, this air conditioner automatically and conveniently cleans the evaporator coil of the indoor unit heat exchanger through the use of condensate water. Moreover, this air conditioner’s inverter technology features multiple compressor frequencies to ensure enhanced cooling performance.

product_description: The scorching heat of the sun can’t get to you when you’re indoors with this Hitachi Air Conditioner keeping things cool. It works efficiently even under trying weather conditions of up to 52-degree Celsius. To simplify maintenance, this air conditioner comes with the Filter Clean Indicator which reminds you when the AC’s filter needs cleaning. Helping in its efficient performance are its Inner Grooved Copper system which assists in the quick and optimum flow of cool air, and its 100% copper condenser, evaporator, and interconnecting pipes.

Note: we highly recommend to use standard & authorized accessories Only. In case customer arranges accessories by his own, Brand Service Engineer might refuse &/or ask for labour charges for fixing these accessories.

product_description: You can enjoy a cool and fresh climate at home even during the summer season with the Panasonic Split Inverter Air Conditioner. Its nanoe X technology offers clean, odour-free indoor air by generating nano-sized hydroxyl radicals. They prevent bacteria, allergies, moulds, viruses, and odours from growing. In addition, the ECONAVI sensor with Human Activity sensor and an Absence Detection sensor analyse human position, movement, and presence to save energy. Furthermore, by adapting to your lifestyle and optimising operation, this distinctive feature offers an energy-efficient performance.

Equipped with an eco-friendly refrigerant, this AC helps to lower your carbon footprint while being energy-efficient.

product_description: Your summers can now be cool and comfortable with the Panasonic Miraie Split Inverter Air Conditioner. It is compatible with the AI-enabled Miraie app, which allows you to control the temperature, track operational status, and change modes. Featuring a personalised sleep mode, this air conditioner enables you to preset temperature profiles throughout the night for improved flexibility and comfort. And, you can also create different temperature profiles for weekdays and weekends. Furthermore, thanks to its auto-diagnosis feature, this AC can detect issues in advance and keep you notified.

product_description: You can enjoy a cool and fresh climate at home even during the summer season with the Panasonic Split Inverter Air Conditioner. Its nanoe X technology offers clean, odour-free indoor air by generating nano-sized hydroxyl radicals. They prevent bacteria, allergies, moulds, viruses, and odours from growing. In addition, the ECONAVI sensor with Human Activity sensor and an Absence Detection sensor analyse human position, movement, and presence to save energy. Furthermore, by adapting to your lifestyle and optimising operation, this distinctive feature offers an energy-efficient performance.

Moreover, this air conditioner is tested for endurance, ensuring long-lasting performance.

product_description: Beat the summer heat with the help of the LG AI Convertible Six-in-one Split Air Conditioner. This powerful appliance uses an AI-based dual inverter to automatically control cooling, fan speed, and vane position based on indoor circumstances. product_name: Daikin 1.5 Ton 5 Star Split Inverter with Anti Microbial Filter AC  - White  (FTKG50TV16U/RKG50TV16U, Copper Condenser)

product_description: You can easily feel the relief from the sweltering summers with the Daikin 1.5 Ton Split Inverter Air Conditioner. With Daikin’s inverter technology, this air conditioner features a variety of compressor frequencies to offer enhanced cooling performance. Integrated with one-button Dew Clean technology, this air conditioner utilises condensate water to effectively and automatically clean the evaporator coil of the heat exchanger in the indoor unit. Moreover, thanks to its PM 2.5 filter, this air conditioner can effectively collect small air particles that are up to 2.5 microns in size to offer clean indoor air.

product_description: You can stay cool and relaxed even during sultry summers with the Daikin 1.5 Ton Split Air Conditioner. It is equipped with a PM 2.5 filter that effectively collects particles up to 2.5 microns in the air, delivering a clean and hygienic indoor environment. And, when you press the key given in the manual, this air conditioner instantly identifies the issue and displays the code connected with the problem on its remote screen. So, you can easily self-diagnose the issue and report it to a Daikin authorised service centre for prompt repair.

product_name: Daikin 1.5 Ton 3 Star Split AC with PM 2.5 Filter  - White  (RL50UV16U3/V3/FTL50UV16U3/V3, Copper Condenser)

product_description: You can stay cool and relaxed even during sultry summers with the Daikin 1.5 Ton Split Air Conditioner. It is equipped with a PM 2.5 filter that effectively collects particles up to 2.5 microns in the air, delivering a clean and hygienic indoor environment. And, when you press the key given in the manual, this air conditioner instantly identifies the issue and displays the code connected with the problem on its remote screen. So, you can easily self-diagnose the issue and report it to a Daikin authorised service centre for prompt repair.

product_name: Daikin 1.8 Ton 5 Star Split Inverter AC  - White

product_description: You can ensure that your room stays cool and comfortable with the Daikin 1.8 Ton Split Inverter Air Conditioner. With its one-button Dew Clean technology, this air conditioner can effectively and automatically clean the evaporator coil of the indoor unit heat exchanger by making use of condensate water. This improves the airflow and enhances the cooling for an extended period of time. Additionally, thanks to Daikin’s inverter technology, this air conditioner features a variety of compressor frequencies to ensure enhanced performance.

product_highlights: 1 Ton
product_name: Daikin 1 Ton Split Inverter AC  - White

product_description: The Daikin air conditioner is designed to provide you with a comfortable and uninterrupted sleep. The Coanda airflow feature provides a comfortable ambience and a fine air-conditioning experience. The Econo mode makes the AC highly energy-efficient, while the New Swing technology helps the Neo Swing compressor within the AC rotate smoothly, decrease friction and vibration, and helps it operate in a silent and efficient manner. Equipped with an inbuilt stabilizer, this air conditioner also comes with a Power Chill operation feature that helps cool down the room rapidly during hot days or extreme heat conditions.

product_description: Hot summers will not be a problem anymore, as you bring home the LG Dual Cool Inverter Air Conditioner. This AC is equipped with the Varied Speed Dual-rotary compressor that offers a wide rotational frequency to save energy consumption and increase the cooling speed. As a result, you can enjoy fast cooling and long-running AC. Also, the device comes with a 5-in-1 convertible cooling system so that you can manage the level of cooling according to your needs. And, this AC features voice control and a WI-FI enabled system so that you can control the AC using apps like Google Assistant and Amazon Alexa. Finally, thanks to the Ocean Black Fin feature, you can enjoy the long term protection of your AC from dust, smoke, and chemicals.

Moreover, this AC's artificial intelligence convertible modes and in-built sensors assess the current conditions and sensor inputs to provide optimal cooling. And, this air conditioner's cooling capability can be easily adjusted as needed.
